name: B's Dumb Maze Game
description:
This was made just to learn some basic Unity stuff. You'll jump, you'll run, you'll collect boxes with the Half-Life pick up sound. You'll complete the game in under 10 minutes (probably under 5).

CONTROLS:

Standard FPS controls: WASD to move, Space to jump, Shift to sprint.

There are additional controls too:

Use X to disable/enable background sound.

Use Q to disable/enable the mini-map (only on Level 2)

KNOWN BUG:

There's also a bug I have no intention of fixing because it's not really worth putting in the time to debug this tiny little tutorial game. On a rare occasion in Level 2, a box will count as more than 1 box. (As in, rather than your score increasing by 1, it will increase by 2 or 3).
